00041 // privileges checking
00042 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'r');
00043 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'w');
00044 
00045 if (!$can_read) {
00046     die('<div class="errorBox">You dont have enough privileges to view this section</div>');
00047 }
00048 
00049 /* member update process */
00050 if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND $can_read AND $can_write) {
00051     // check form validity
00052     $memberID = trim($_POST['memberID']);
00053     $memberName = trim($_POST['memberName']);
00054     $mpasswd1 = trim($_POST['memberPasswd']);
00055     $mpasswd2 = trim($_POST['memberPasswd2']);
00056     if (empty($memberID) OR empty($memberName)) {
00057         utility::jsAlert(__('Member ID and Name can\'t be empty')); //mfc
00058         exit();
00059     } else if (($mpasswd1 AND $mpasswd2) AND ($mpasswd1 !== $mpasswd2)) {
00060         utility::jsAlert(__('Password confirmation does not match. See if your Caps Lock key is on!'));
00061         exit();
00062     } else {
00063         $data['member_id'] = $dbs->escape_string($memberID);
00064         $data['member_name'] = $dbs->escape_string($memberName);
00065         $data['member_type_id'] = (integer)$_POST['memberTypeID'];
00066         $data['inst_name'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['instName'])));
00067         $data['gender'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['gender'])));
00068         $data['birth_date'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['birthDate'])));
00069         $data['register_date'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['regDate'])));
00070         $data['expire_date'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['expDate'])));
00071         // extending membership
00072         if (isset($_POST['extend']) AND !empty($_POST['extend'])) {
00073             // get membership periode from database
00074             $mtype_query = $dbs->query("SELECT member_periode FROM mst_member_type WHERE member_type_id=".$data['member_type_id']);
00075             $mtype_data = $mtype_query->fetch_row();
00076             $data['register_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00077             $data['expire_date'] = simbio_date::getNextDate($mtype_data[0], $data['register_date']);
00078         }
00079         // member since date
00080         if (!isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00081             $data['member_since_date'] = $data['register_date'];
00082         }
00083         $data['pin'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberPIN'])));
00084         $data['member_address'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberAddress'])));
00085         $data['member_phone'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberPhone'])));
00086         $data['member_fax'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberFax'])));
00087         $data['postal_code'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberPostal'])));
00088         $data['member_notes'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberNotes'])));
00089         $data['member_email'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['memberEmail'])));
00090         $data['is_pending'] = intval($_POST['isPending']);
00091         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00092         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00093         if (!empty($_FILES['image']) AND $_FILES['image']['size']) {
00094             // create upload object
00095             $upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00096             $upload->setAllowableFormat($sysconf['allowed_images']);
00097             $upload->setMaxSize($sysconf['max_image_upload']*1024); // approx. 100 kb
00098             $upload->setUploadDir(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'persons');
00099             // give new name for upload file
00100             $new_filename = 'member_'.$data['member_id'];
00101             $upload_status = $upload->doUpload('image', $new_filename);
00102             if ($upload_status == UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00103                 $data['member_image'] = $dbs->escape_string($upload->new_filename);
00104             }
00105         }
00106         // password confirmation
00107         if (($mpasswd1 AND $mpasswd2) AND ($mpasswd1 === $mpasswd2)) {
00108             $data['mpasswd'] = 'literal{MD5(\''.$mpasswd2.'\')}';
00109         }
00110 
00111         // create sql op object
00112         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00113         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00114             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00115             // remove input date
00116             unset($data['input_date']);
00117             // filter update record ID
00118             $updateRecordID = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['updateRecordID']));
00119             $old_member_ID = $updateRecordID;
00120             // update the data
00121             $update = $sql_op->update('member', $data, "member_id='$updateRecordID'");
00122             if ($update) {
00123                 // update other tables contain this member ID
00124                 @$dbs->query('UPDATE loan SET member_id=\''.$data['member_id'].'\' WHERE member_id=\''.$old_member_ID.'\'');
00125                 @$dbs->query('UPDATE fines SET member_id=\''.$data['member_id'].'\' WHERE member_id=\''.$old_member_ID.'\'');
00126                 utility::jsAlert(__('Member Data Successfully Updated'));
00127                 // upload status alert
00128                 if (isset($upload_status)) {
00129                     if ($upload_status == UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00130                         // write log
00131                         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' upload image file '.$upload->new_filename);
00132                         utility::jsAlert(__('Image Uploaded Successfully'));
00133                     } else {
00134                         // write log
00135                         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', 'ERROR : '.$_SESSION['realname'].' FAILED TO upload image file '.$upload->new_filename.', with error ('.$upload->error.')');
00136                         utility::jsAlert(__('Image FAILED to upload'));
00137                     }
00138                 }
00139                 // write log
00140                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' update member data ('.$memberName.') with ID ('.$memberID.')');
00141                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'post\');</script>';
00142             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Member Data FAILED to Save/Update. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00143             exit();
00144         } else {
00145             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00146             if (!$mpasswd1 AND !$mpasswd2) { $data['mpasswd'] = 'literal{NULL}'; }
00147             // insert the data
00148             $insert = $sql_op->insert('member', $data);
00149             if ($insert) {
00150                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Member Data Successfully Saved'));
00151                 // upload status alert
00152                 if (isset($upload_status)) {
00153                     if ($upload_status == UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00154                         // write log
00155                         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' upload image file '.$upload->new_filename);
00156                         utility::jsAlert(__('Image Uploaded Successfully'));
00157                     } else {
00158                         // write log
00159                         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', 'ERROR : '.$_SESSION['realname'].' FAILED TO upload image file '.$upload->new_filename.', with error ('.$upload->error.')');
00160                         utility::jsAlert(__('Image FAILED to upload'));
00161                     }
00162                 }
00163                 // write log
00164                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' add new member ('.$memberName.') with ID ('.$memberID.')');
00165                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'get\');</script>';
00166             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Member Data FAILED to Save/Update. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00167             exit();
00168         }
00169     }
00170     exit();
00171 } else if (isset($_POST['batchExtend']) && $can_read && $can_write) {
00172     /* BATCH extend membership proccessing */
00173     $curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00174     $num_extended = 0;
00175     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00176         $memberID = $dbs->escape_string(trim($itemID));
00177         // get membership periode from database
00178         $mtype_q = $dbs->query('SELECT member_periode, m.member_name FROM member AS m
00179             LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id
00180             WHERE m.member_id=\''.$memberID.'\'');
00181         $mtype_d = $mtype_q->fetch_row();
00182         $expire_date = simbio_date::getNextDate($mtype_d[0], $curr_date);
00183         @$dbs->query('UPDATE member SET expire_date=\''.$expire_date.'\' WHERE member_id=\''.$memberID.'\'');
00184         // write log
00185         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' extends membership for member ('.$mtype_d[1].') with ID ('.$memberID.')');
00186         $num_extended++;
00187     }
00188     header('Location: '.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'membership/index.php?expire=true&numExtended='.$num_extended);
00189     exit();
00190 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00191     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00192         die();
00193     }
00194     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00195     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00196     $failed_array = array();
00197     $error_num = 0;
00198     $still_have_loan = array();
00199     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00200         // make an array
00201         $_POST['itemID'] = array($dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['itemID'])));
00202     }
00203     // loop array
00204     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00205         $itemID = $dbs->escape_string(trim($itemID));
00206         // check if the member still have loan
00207         $loan_q = $dbs->query('SELECT DISTINCT m.member_id, m.member_name, COUNT(l.loan_id) FROM member AS m
00208             LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON (m.member_id=l.member_id AND l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0)
00209             WHERE m.member_id=\''.$itemID.'\' GROUP BY m.member_id');
00210         $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00211         if ($loan_d[2] < 1) {
00212             if (!$sql_op->delete('member', "member_id='$itemID'")) {
00213                 $error_num++;
00214             } else {
00215                 // write log
00216                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', $_SESSION['realname'].' DELETE member data ('.$loan_d[1].') with ID ('.$loan_d[0].')');
00217             }
00218         } else {
00219             $still_have_loan[] = $loan_d[0].' - '.$loan_d[1];
00220             $error_num++;
00221         }
00222     }
00223 
00224     if ($still_have_loan) {
00225         $members = '';
00226         foreach ($still_have_loan as $mbr) {
00227             $members .= $mbr."\n";
00228         }
00229         utility::jsAlert(__('Below member data can\'t be deleted because still have unreturned item(s)').' : '."\n".$mbr);
00230         exit();
00231     }
00232     // error alerting
00233     if ($error_num == 0) {
00234         utility::jsAlert(__('All Data Successfully Deleted'));
00235         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00236     } else {
00237         utility::jsAlert(__('Some or All Data NOT deleted successfully!\nPlease contact system administrator'));
00238         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00239     }
00240     exit();
00241 }
00242 /* RECORD OPERATION END */

00244 /* search form */
00245 ?>
00246 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00247 <div class="menuBoxInner memberIcon">
00248     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Membership')); ?> - <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>membership/index.php?action=detail', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Add New Member'); ?></a>
00249     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>membership/index.php', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Member List'); ?></a>
00250     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>membership/index.php?expire=true', 'get');" class="headerText2" style="color: #FF0000;"><?php echo __('View Expired Member'); ?></a>

00260 /* main content */
00261 if (isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail')) {
00262     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00263         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00264     }
00265     /* RECORD FORM */
00266     $itemID = $dbs->escape_string(trim(isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:''));
00267     $rec_q = $dbs->query("SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id='$itemID'");
00268     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00269 
00270     // create new instance
00271     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00272     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00273 
00274     // form table attributes
00275     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00276     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00277     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00278 
00279     // edit mode flag set
00280     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00281         $form->edit_mode = true;
00282         // record ID for delete process
00283         $form->record_id = $itemID;
00284         // form record title
00285         $form->record_title = $rec_d['member_name'];
00286         // submit button attribute
00287         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00288     }
00289 
00290     /* Form Element(s) */
00291     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00292         // check if member expired
00293         $curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00294         $compared_date = simbio_date::compareDates($rec_d['expire_date'], $curr_date);
00295         $is_expired = ($compared_date == $curr_date);
00296         $expired_message = '';
00297         if ($is_expired) {
00298             // extend membership
00299             $chbox_array[] = array('1', __('Extend'));
00300             $form->addCheckBox('extend', __('Extend Membership'), $chbox_array);
00301             $expired_message = '<b style="color: #FF0000;">('.__('Membership Already Expired').')</b>';
00302         }
00303     }
00304     // member code
00305     $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('text', 'memberID', $rec_d['member_id'], 'id="memberID" onblur="ajaxCheckID(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/AJAX_check_id.php\', \'member\', \'member_id\', \'msgBox\', \'memberID\')" style="width: 30%;"');
00306     $str_input .= ' &nbsp; <span id="msgBox">&nbsp;</span>';
00307     $form->addAnything(__('Member ID').'*', $str_input);
00308     // member name
00309     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberName', __('Member Name').'*', $rec_d['member_name'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00310     // member birth date
00311     $form->addDateField('birthDate', __('Birth Date'), $rec_d['birth_date']);
00312     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00313         // member since
00314         $form->addAnything(__('Member Since'), $rec_d['member_since_date']);
00315     }
00316     // member register date
00317     $form->addDateField('regDate', __('Register Date'), $rec_d['register_date']);
00318     // member expire date
00319     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00320         $form->addDateField('expDate', __('Expiry Date'), $rec_d['expire_date']);
00321     } else {
00322         $chbox_array[] = array('1', __('Auto Set'));
00323         $str_input = '<div>'.simbio_form_element::checkBox('extend', $chbox_array, '1').'</div>';
00324         $str_input .= '<div>'.simbio_form_element::dateField('expDate', $rec_d['expire_date']).'</div>';
00325         $form->addAnything(__('Expiry Date').'*', $str_input);
00326     }
00327     // member institution
00328     $form->addTextField('text', 'instName', __('Institution'), $rec_d['inst_name'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00329     // member type
00330         // get mtype data related to this record from database
00331         $mtype_query = $dbs->query("SELECT member_type_id, member_type_name FROM mst_member_type");
00332         $mtype_options = array();
00333         while ($mtype_data = $mtype_query->fetch_row()) {
00334             $mtype_options[] = array($mtype_data[0], $mtype_data[1]);
00335         }
00336     $form->addSelectList('memberTypeID', __('Membership Type'), $mtype_options, $rec_d['member_type_id']);
00337     // member gender
00338     $gender_chbox[0] = array('1', __('Male'));
00339     $gender_chbox[1] = array('0', __('Female'));
00340     $form->addRadio('gender', __('Gender'), $gender_chbox, !empty($rec_d['gender'])?$rec_d['gender']:'0');
00341     // member address
00342     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'memberAddress', __('Address'), $rec_d['member_address'], 'rows="2" style="width: 100%;"');
00343     // member postal
00344     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberPostal', __('Postal Code'), $rec_d['postal_code'], 'style="width: 60%;"');
00345     // member phone
00346     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberPhone', __('Phone Number'), $rec_d['member_phone'], 'style="width: 60%;"');
00347     // member fax
00348     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberFax', __('Fax Number'), $rec_d['member_fax'], 'style="width: 60%;"');
00349     // member pin
00350     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberPIN', __('Personal ID Number'), $rec_d['pin'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00351     // member notes
00352     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'memberNotes', __('Notes'), $rec_d['member_notes'], 'rows="2" style="width: 100%;"');
00353     // member is_pending
00354     $form->addCheckBox('isPending', __('Pending Membership'), array( array('1', __('Yes')) ), $rec_d['is_pending']);
00355     // member photo
00356     if ($rec_d['member_image']) {
00357         $str_input = '<a href="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'images/persons/'.$rec_d['member_image'].'" target="_blank"><strong>'.$rec_d['member_image'].'</strong></a><br />';
00358         $str_input .= simbio_form_element::textField('file', 'image');
00359         $str_input .= ' '.__('Maximum').' '.$sysconf['max_image_upload'].' KB'; //mfc
00360         $form->addAnything(__('Photo'), $str_input);
00361     } else {
00362         $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('file', 'image');
00363         $str_input .= ' '.__('Maximum').' '.$sysconf['max_image_upload'].' KB'; //mfc
00364         $form->addAnything(__('Photo'), $str_input);
00365     }
00366     // member email
00367     $form->addTextField('text', 'memberEmail', __('E-mail'), $rec_d['member_email'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00368     // member password
00369     $form->addTextField('password', 'memberPasswd', __('New Password'), null, 'style="width: 40%;"');
00370     // member password confirmation
00371     $form->addTextField('password', 'memberPasswd2', __('Confirm New Password'), null, 'style="width: 40%;"');
00372 
00373     // edit mode messagge
00374     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00375         echo '<div class="infoBox" style="overflow: auto;">'
00376             .'<div style="float: left; width: 80%;">'.__('You are going to edit member data').' : <b>'.$rec_d['member_name'].'</b> <br />'.__('Last Updated').' '.$rec_d['last_update'].' '.$expired_message
00377             .'<div>'.__('Leave Password field blank if you don\'t want to change the password').'</div>'
00378             .'</div>';
00379             if ($rec_d['member_image']) {
00380                 if (file_exists(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'persons/'.$rec_d['member_image'])) {
00381                     echo '<div style="float: right;"><img src="../lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php?src=../../images/persons/'.urlencode($rec_d['member_image']).'&w=53" style="border: 1px solid #999999" /></div>';
00382                 }
00383             }
00384         echo '</div>'."\n";
00385     }
00386     // print out the form object
00387     echo $form->printOut();
00388 } else {
00389     /* MEMBERSHIP LIST */
00390     // table spec
00391     $table_spec = 'member AS m
00392         LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id';
00393 
00394     // create datagrid
00395     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00396     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00397         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('m.member_id',
00398             'm.member_id AS \''.__('Member ID').'\'',
00399             'm.member_name AS \''.__('Member Name').'\'',
00400             'mt.member_type_name AS \''.__('Membership Type').'\'',
00401             'm.member_email AS \''.__('E-mail').'\'',
00402             'm.last_update AS \''.__('Last Updated').'\'');
00403     } else {
00404         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('m.member_id AS \''.__('Member ID').'\'',
00405             'm.member_name AS \''.__('Member Name').'\'',
00406             'mt.member_type_name AS \''.__('Membership Type').'\'',
00407             'm.member_email AS \''.__('E-mail').'\'',
00408             'm.last_update AS \''.__('Last Updated').'\'');
00409     }
00410     $datagrid->setSQLorder('member_name ASC');
00411 
00412     // is there any search
00413     $criteria = 'm.member_id IS NOT NULL ';
00414     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00415        $keywords = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00416        $criteria .= " AND (m.member_name LIKE '%$keywords%' OR m.member_id LIKE '%$keywords%') ";
00417     }
00418     if (isset($_GET['expire'])) {
00419         $criteria .= " AND TO_DAYS('".date('Y-m-d')."')>TO_DAYS(m.expire_date)";
00420     }
00421     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00422 
00423     // set table and table header attributes
00424     $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00425     $datagrid->table_name = 'memberList';
00426     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00427     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00428     // set delete proccess URL
00429     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00430 
00431     // put the result into variables
00432     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00433     if ((isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) OR isset($_GET['expire'])) {
00434         echo '<div class="infoBox">';
00435         if (isset($_GET['expire'])) {
00436             echo '<b style="color: #FF0000;">'.__('Expired Member List').'</b><hr size="1" />';
00437             echo '<div><input type="button" value="'.__('Extend Selected Member(s)').'" onclick="javascript: if (confirm(\''.__('Are you sure to EXTEND membership for selected members?').'\')) { setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'membership/index.php?expire=1\', \'post\', $H($(\'memberList\').serialize(true)).update({ batchExtend: \'true\' }) ); }" class="button" /></div>';
00438             if (isset($_GET['numExtended']) AND $_GET['numExtended'] > 0) {
00439                 echo '<div><strong>'.$_GET['numExtended'].'</strong> '.__('members extended!').'</div>'; //mfc
00440             }
00441         }
00442         if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00443             echo __('Found').' '.$datagrid->num_rows.' '.__('from your search with keyword').' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"'; //mfc
00444         }
00445         echo '</div>';
00446     }
00447 
00448     echo $datagrid_result;
00449 }
